thread.title: Pankaj Advani in world billiards final
thread.title_full: Pankaj Advani in world billiards final - The Times of India

author: Sunil Subbaiah
title: Pankaj Advani in world billiards final
text:
BENGALURU: Reigning world champion Pankaj Advani will take on Singapore's Peter Gilchrist in the final of the IBSF World Billiards 150-Up format in Adelaide on Wednesday.
In the semifinals, Gilchrist defeated Sourav Kothari of India 5-1 while Advani ousted Nalin Patel of England 5-0.
Advani, who did not allow Nalin to settle down at any stage in first three games and crafted breaks of 102, 106 and 95 to lead 3-0. Though Nalin had good chance in fourth game to recover where he made a break of 110 but fumbled with his chances. Advani capitalised on his opponents errors to race to 4-0.
Nalin had meager chances in fifth game, but can't do much as Advani produced two breaks of 68 and 76 to wrap up the contest 5-0.
On the other side, Peter Gilchrist got some resistance from Kothari. He scored decent breaks in all six games to win 5-1 to secure a berth in the final.
